We were looking for something casual and delicious, and we found it.  Highlights were the fried eggplant with balsamic glaze tapas, the goat cheese with greens and walnut salad, and the lemon sorbet for dessert.  Laid back, courteous, and helpful staff.  Decent wines at decent prices, not as crazy as the usual tapas bar.  After a week of "Spanish food," Cornelia was a fantastic choice..
